items.headline: Sinclair, Nexstar end boycott of Jimmy Kimmel show
items.summary_en: Local-television giants Sinclair Inc. and Nexstar Media Group Inc. said Friday that they were ending their boycott of late-night talk-show host Jimmy Kimmel’s program, returning “Jimmy Kimmel Live!” to the companies’ ABC affiliate stations.
